cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 165 miles SSE of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to drift north-northwest then northwest, approaching the South and North Carolina coastline during the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolina/North Carolina border (close to Myrtle Beach)

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to south of South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC to Cape Lookout NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coastal South Carolina and North Carolina
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (<5%) of tropical-storm-force winds; breezy conditions possible
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands could bring light to moderate rain, generally under 2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip currents and rough surf along the southeast Florida beaches
